meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Liza Taylor Masao Okazaki Greg Rombach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1173.

td.p: Liza Taylor, a novelist originally from Washington, D.C.
Masao Okazaki, a physician originally from Rochester, Minnesota
Greg Rombach, a salesman from Glendale, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,700)

tr.td: 4-LETTER WORDS
HISTORIC NAMES
STOCK SYMBOLS
THE FUNNIES
HATS
ACTOR-PLAYWRIGHTS

the Legion of Honor

MasaoLiza
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_5_4', 'clue_DJ_5_4_stuck', '(Masao: What are the Andy Hardy films?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Masao: What is "The Life of Andy Hardy"?)
(Alex: [sighs] No, I don\'t think I can accept that.)
(Greg: What are the Hardy Boys films?)
...
(Alex: "Who was [*]?" Yes. He was in that series of films, but we were going for the judge. Liza, you get to pick.)

Judge Hardy

GregMasaoLiza
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Forget about animals, they came later.)
...
(Alex: [To Liza] No, he came much later.)
...
(Alex: The correct response is "What is [*]?" [*]. 3rd day, grass.)
GregWHAT IS SEALIFE?
$5,400
MasaoWhat are Fish?
$6,000
LizaWhat was man?
$5,001
plant life')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Created on the 3rd day, it was, according to Genesis, the 1st form of life on Earth')

tr.td: THE BIBLE
Created on the 3rd day, it was, according to Genesis, the 1st form of life on Earth
Greg
Masao
Liza
3rd place: Landes 5-piece silver serving set + Nintendo Entertainment System featuring the Family & Junior Editions of Jeopardy! & Wheel of Fortune
2nd place: Easy-Rest Inc. sofa & love-seat + Capri Lighting spotlights
New champion: $2,999
Greg
Masao
Liza

19 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W

(including 2 DDs),
3 W
